Detailed Description

Abstract interface to any board supported by the library.

void Board::readBlock (  const unsigned int  address,
unsigned int *  data,
const unsigned int  count,
const bool  inc = true
)  [virtual]
 

Read multiple values from the board address space.

Parameters:
address Address in the board.
data An array where to read values into.
count Number of values to read from the board's address space, in dwords.
inc Increment the address on the FPGA side (default: true).
Exceptions:
mprace::Exception On error.

Reimplemented in mprace::ABB, and mprace::MPRACE2.

void Board::readDMA (  const unsigned int  address,
DMABuffer &  buf,
const unsigned int  count,
const unsigned int  offset = 0,
const bool  inc = true,
const bool  lock = true
)  [virtual]
 

Read multiple values from the board address space to a DMA Buffer.

Parameters:
address Address in the board.
data An array where to read values into.
count Number of values to read from the board's address space, in dwords.
offset Offset in the DMA buffer, in dwords (default = 0).
inc Increment the address on the FPGA side (default: true).
lock Lock until the write finishes (default: true)
Exceptions:
mprace::Exception On error.

Reimplemented in mprace::ABB, and mprace::MPRACE2.

const unsigned int *  data,
const unsigned int  count,
const bool  inc = true
)  [virtual]
 

Write multiple values to the board address space.

Parameters:
address Address in the board.
data Values to write.
count Number of values to write, in dwords.
inc Increment the address on the FPGA side (default: true).
Exceptions:
mprace::Exception On error.

Reimplemented in mprace::ABB, and mprace::MPRACE2.

void Board::writeDMA (  const unsigned int  address,
const DMABuffer &  buf,
const unsigned int  count,
const unsigned int  offset = 0,
const bool  inc = true,
const bool  lock = true
)  [virtual]
 

Write multiple values from a DMA Buffer to the board address space.

Parameters:
address Address in the board.
data Values to write.
count Number of values to write, in dwords.
offset Offset in the DMA buffer, in dwords (default = 0).
inc Increment the address on the FPGA side (default: true).
lock Lock until the write finishes (default: true)
Exceptions:
mprace::Exception On error.

Reimplemented in mprace::ABB, and mprace::MPRACE2.
